text: Sano aŵala ŵaakufuulu ŵatite: “Ngasin’jipikanila aji Qur’aniji, soni n’jitendeleje masegwe (ndema jajikusoomedwa) kuti mwine m’be ŵakupunda.” Basi chisimu chene chitwape kupasya aŵala ŵaakufuulu ilagasyo yaukali nnope, ni chitwalipile kwene malipilo gakusakala nnope, ligongo lya itendo yao yangalumbana yaŵaliji nkupanganya
